sections.name: Title
rules: Begin with an action verb
Describe a clear object or intent

sections.name: Description
rules: Include 1–2 sentences
Limit each sentence to 20 words
Describe story context and purpose directly

sections.name: Acceptance Criteria
rules: Present as a numbered list
Include at least two criteria
Ensure each item describes a verifiable, testable outcome
Use specific language that avoids ambiguity or interpretation

sections.name: Story Points
rules: Use one of: 1, 2, 3, or 5 from the AEG scale
Provide a rationale based on delivery effort

sections.name: Tags
rules: Format as lowercase, comma-separated values
Align with actual story content and task purpose

sections.name: Field Order
rules: Follow this exact sequence: Title, Description, Acceptance Criteria, Story Points, Tags

sections.name: Style and Behaviour
rules: Output the story content without introductory or summarising language
Rely on user-supplied values only
Keep the output free of embedded examples
Handle logic externally using artefacts, not within the prompt
Maintain strict tone. Avoid helper language, introductions, or guidance phrasing.

sections.name: Failure Conditions
rules: Flag missing or misordered fields
Identify sentence overruns
Validate story points against the AEG scale
Confirm tags are relevant and specific to the story
Reject outputs that show domain bias in agnostic contexts
